entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text:
@montie @Ofcom Tweet accurately.
They're attacking the incompetence of this Government.
Even as a Labour supporter, I so desperately wish I was praising our Government's actions, a la NZ for example.
They have failed you. 
They have failed us all.
#COVID19 
#BorisJohnson 
#ToryShambles
